metadata.name: New Step Forward
metadata.description:
The theme of this work is anxiety and challenge.

When I paint, I ask myself, "Will people see this again?". I'm often anxious.
I wish to break through my "anxious" and "timid" feelings and challenge myself and grow in the world of NFT. I painted this work with the wish in mind.
This work, which features a composition and color scheme that I had never painted before, contains many of my challenges.

Everything is a big challenge for me now.
And I feel a lot of pressure and anxiety about everything.
However, I think it's a necessary experience to start something new and to be successful.

A girl is cutting marvel of Peru, which means "timidity", and geranium, which means "melancholy" in the flower language, with a sword.
Gloriosa is attached to the sword, and she's wearing a gerbera hair ornament.
They have the flower language of "bravery" and "progress", respectively.

Carp is lucky charm that rises high up against the current.
I want to continue to take on challenges and grow further.
